article: A twenty-year-old boy never went to the market  before .One day, his father let him go to the market to sell shoes made by themselves.When the boy got there with a big bag of shoes, the market was already crowded .He found a place, put down the bag and carefully watched people coming and going .He didn't get home   _ the sun set."How many pairs of shoes did you _ today?" "Not a single  pair!" said the boy _ great sorrow."What? What did you stay there the whole day _ ?" shouted his father," No one needed shoes, father," said the boy."I saw everyone had a pair of shoes  _ ."
